channel.title: Studio City on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Studio City on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Black Market Liquor Bar
item.description: No, this isn’t the clothing store on the west side. This is the Black Market Liquor Bar in Studio City. I went here with my cousin based on reviews from a friend. People and Zagat say it’s good, so we checked this out. The decor of the restaurant was interesting. There’s a sign on top of the building that says “Victory Motorcycles Co”, so I was curious as if I went to the right place.
